album.title: Da King of Da Rap Game??  (Mixed by DJ Jay Faire)

track.name: Love You More
comments: Prototype of "Love the Way You Lie"
Wish he'd make more songs like this in the current times.
This is no Kim, but if you really listen it's at least subtly reeeally fucked up
So sad and beautiful. "Cause you love me and I love you more.."

'Cause I hate you, do you hate me? Good, 'cause you're so fucking beautiful when you're angry It makes me wanna just take you and just throw you on the bed and fuck you like I don't even know you You FUCK other people and I FUCK other people You're a SLUT, but I'm equal, I'm a MUTT, we're both evil in our ways but neither one of us would ever admit it 'Cause one of us would have one up on the other so forget it
this reminds me of my relationship with my bf :( he left me to go to virginia... </3
the Encore version is even better. this has gotta be one of Em's best.
